title: I bought championship riven back when she first came out in season 2. Yet, i don't have the border.
body: My friend told me i should have the border, yet i do not have it. why is that?

replies.body: I noticed you had both versions of Championship Riven, so you may just be using the wrong version. Hop into a practice or custom match while using both versions to see if this is what's going wrong.
Thanks a bunch, I'll have to check it out now.
